name: abc kidos
description:
hello 👋

❀ABC kidos❀

a kids' game where you have to collect letters to beat a computer ... sounds familiar ... not alphabet lore .. well more like a game I made called jump away ⎨link to the game down below☟⎬

?how to play?

• hover your mouse over a player

 • collect as many letters as you can

  • show your high score to others

   • etc...

✐ this game was made for school use ✐
